verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARGM-LOC: In a stinging rebuke] , [ARG0: the Justice Department watchdog] [V: declared] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that former FBI Director James Comey was " insubordinate " in his handling of the Hillary Clinton email investigation in the explosive final months of the 2016 presidential campaign] . But it also found there was no evidence that Comey 's or the department 's final conclusions were motivated by political bias toward either candidate . President Donald Trump had looked to the much - anticipated report to provide a fresh line of attack against Comey and the FBI as Trump claims that a politically tainted bureau tried to undermine his campaign and , through the later Russia investigation , his presidency .
